problem.markdown: 3. An nMOS transistor in 180nm technology has Vdd=1.8V, Vtn=0.5V, Vgs=3V. The transistor is in saturation when ( ) Vds=0 ( ) Vds is lower than 2.5V (x) Vds is greater than 2.5V ( ) Independent of Vds
